Infinitum Framework

Packages
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.activity Provides the classes necessary for Activity injection and autowiring.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.activity.annotation Provides the annotations which back the Infinitum Activity injection framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop Provides the classes necessary for aspect-oriented programming.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.annotation Provides the annotations which back the Infinitum AOP framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.impl Provides concrete implementations for the AOP framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context Provides the classes necessary for configuring Infinitum and providing application-wide access to configuration information.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.exception Provides exception classes for the context framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context.impl Provides concrete implementations for the context framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di Provides the classes necessary for performing dependency injection.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.annotation Provides the annotations which back the Infinitum DI framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.impl Provides concrete implementations for the DI framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.exception Provides general framework-wide exception classes.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.internal Provides internal utility classes.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.internal.bind Provides classes containing internally bound values.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.logging Provides classes pertaining to the logging framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.logging.impl Provides concrete implementations for the logging framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm Provides the classes necessary for the Infinitum ORM.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.annotation Provides the annotations which back the Infinitum ORM.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria Provides classes for the criteria API, which is used to construct database queries based on objects rather than SQL.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.criteria.criterion Provides the criterion classes, which together form a Criteria query.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.exception Provides exception classes for the ORM framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence Provides the classes necessary for mapping and persisting data between domain objects and database tables.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence.impl Provides concrete implementations for the persistence framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.relationship Provides the classes necessary to model entity relationships.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sql Provides utility classes for constructing and executing SQL statements.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite Provides the classes necessary for SQLite object-relational mapping.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.sqlite.impl Provides concrete implementations for the SQLite ORM framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.reflection Provides reflection classes for analyzing project source code at runtime.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.reflection.impl Provides concrete implementations for the reflection framework.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest Provides the classes necessary for communicating with RESTful web services.
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.impl Provides concrete implementations for the RESTful client framework.
